sentence: The image is a screenshot of an app interface, highlighting an "App of the Day" feature.
sentence_cn: 该图是应用程序界面的屏幕截图，突出显示了“今日应用程序”功能。

sentence: - The app being highlighted is "myTuner Radio," which is advertised with a "Save $2.99" badge and is currently free.
sentence_cn: - 重点介绍的应用程序是“myTuner Radio”，它打着“节省 2.99 美元”的标签，目前免费。

sentence: - The description mentions listening options, like Chicago talk radio and breaking news in Southeast Asia, with a "Read More" link.
sentence_cn: - 描述中提到了收听选项，例如芝加哥谈话广播和东南亚突发新闻，并带有“阅读更多”链接。

sentence: - Below the description, there are promotional images of the app:
sentence_cn: - 描述下方有该应用程序的宣传图片：

sentence: - The first image indicates "30,000 radio stations in 180 countries."
sentence_cn: - 第一张图片显示“180个国家的30,000个广播电台”。

sentence: - The second image states "25 million users."
sentence_cn: - 第二张图片显示“2500 万用户”。

sentence: - The third highlights "news, sports & music stations."
sentence_cn: - 第三重点介绍“新闻、体育和音乐电台”。
- 第四部分提到“100 万个播客”。

sentence: - The interface includes options to share via Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and another generic share icon.
sentence_cn: - 界面包括通过 Facebook、Twitter、Google+ 和其他通用共享图标共享的选项。

sentence: - There¡¯s a countdown timer labeled "Time Remaining: 16:01:36."
sentence_cn: - 有一个倒计时器，标有“剩余时间：16:01:36”。

sentence: - A "More Apps" button is visible, encouraging further exploration of available apps.
sentence_cn: - 可见“更多应用程序”按钮，鼓励进一步探索可用的应用程序。
